title: ‘It Will Be Difficult, but I’ll Try’: Van der Poel Vows to Come out Swinging against Pogačar, Evenepoel in World Title Defense
content:
Dutchman lean after Spanish training camp and mean after Euros tune-up, but can he survive leg-zapping world championship course in Zurich?

Read the full article at ‘It Will Be Difficult, but I’ll Try’: Van der Poel Vows to Come out Swinging against Pogačar, Evenepoel in World Title Defense on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
